actions.description: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage.
actions.name: Unarmed Strike

actions.description:
The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18):
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)

3/day each: see invisibility, telekinesis

1/day each: globe of invulnerability, plane shift, wall of force
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

actions.description: The githzerai makes one Unarmed Strike attack.
actions.name: Strike

actions.description: The githzerai teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.
actions.name: Teleport

actions.description: The githzerai casts the reverse gravity spell, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability. The spell has the normal effect, except that the githzerai can orient the area in any direction and creatures and objects fall toward the end of the area.
actions.name: Change Gravity (Costs 3 Actions)

specialTraits.description: If the githzerai fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.
specialTraits.name: Psychic Defense
